attributes.action: Bring ILR visa fee and other visa fee as per of EU nationals
attributes.additional_details: Bring the visa fees for non EU nationals down.Why such a huge difference? It is inhumane. People from other countries also work hard. It needs to be same.
attributes.background: There is wide variation of visa fees for nationals compared to EU nationals. For EU national, to get settled status it is just £100, whereas for others, to get ILR it is more than £2400. It is more than 20 times. If a person has family members, then to get ILR, it will be more than £5000.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590769
